name: CoinTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask Coin Tracker for the current price of bitcoin”
”Alexa, ask Coin Tracker for the latest prices”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coin tracker
des: Want to know the current price of Bitcoin, Ethereum, or Litecoin? Just say, "Alexa, ask CoinTracker for the current price of bitcoin." To use the skill, enable it from the Alexa app or by saying "Alexa, enable CoinTracker."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
